articles.description: Former England goalkeeper Joe Hart, who will be a BBC pundit at Euro 2024, on his new role and why England can go all the way.
articles.title: Joe Hart's BBC Sport column: 'Winning these Euros not just down to having the best players'

articles.description: South Africa claim a nervy four-run win over Bangladesh that puts them on the brink of a spot in the T20 World Cup Super 8s.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: South Africa hold on to beat Bangladesh by four runs

articles.description: Charlie Dobson takes men's 400m silver and Molly Caudery wins women's pole vault bronze at the European Athletics Championships in Rome.
articles.title: European Athletics Championships 2024: Britons Charlie Dobson and Molly Caudery win medals

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu says she is in a "really fit place" as she prepares to start her grass-court season at the Nottingham Open.
articles.title: Nottingham Open: Emma Raducanu in a 'really fit place'

articles.description: More than two weeks after Manchester United's FA Cup triumph, Eric ten Hag still awaits a decision on his future.
articles.title: Eric ten Hag's future: Manchester United manager's wait for club decision enters third week

articles.description: The Netherlands midfielder Frenkie de Jong, who has struggled to recover from an ankle issue, has had to pull out of Euro 2024 through injury.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Frenkie de Jong to miss tournament for Netherlands

articles.description: Defending champion Katie Boulter edges out Harriet Dart in a marathon all-British tie to reach the second round of the Nottingham Open.
articles.title: Nottingham Open: Katie Boulter defeats fellow Briton Harriet Dart in first round

articles.description: Sale flanker Tom Curry has been named in England coach Steve Borthwick’s 36-man squad for the tour of Japan and New Zealand.
articles.title: Tom Curry: Sale flanker named in England squad for summer tour

articles.description: The Black Football Partnership criticises media coverage of England's game against Iceland following a number of outlets using a picture of Bukayo Saka.
articles.title: Bukayo Saka: Media coverage criticised after England defeat

articles.description: Nigeria suffer defeat in qualifying for the 2026 World Cup while Jordan Ayew hits a hat-trick to inspire a comeback win for Ghana.
articles.title: World Cup 2026 qualifying: Nigeria suffer setback, Jordan Ayew hits Ghana hat-trick
